categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems aquatic vehicles

nodes.text: The Trade Federation Battleship, not to be confused with the Trade Federation's space-faring Lucrehulk-class battleship, was a large ship built for the Trade Federation's aquatic naval forces.

The battleship was deployed as a starfighter transport, capable of launching waves of Scarab-class droid starfighters, Vulture droid starfighters, and Trade Federation droid bombers. These vessels carried droid control signals with a limited range, meaning that any Vulture droids caught out of its radius were instantly destroyed.

Count Dooku used a battleship to cross the Jenuwaa Sea on Kalee to retrieve Qymaen jai Sheelal following his shuttle crash. Jedi Master Adi Gallia encountered two battleships on the planet Maramere prior to the First Battle of Geonosis, and, aided by Reti, Nym, and Jinkins, succeeded in destroying both.
